6 OscWavetable::OscWavetable()
7 : sample_rate(48000),
8 idx(0.0f),
9 freq(0.0f),
10 delta(0.0f),
11 wavetable(bdsp::wavetable::SINE4096),
12 table_len(4096)
13 {
14 }
15
16 void OscWavetable::reset(double _sample_rate)
17 {
18 sample_rate = _sample_rate;
19 idx = 0.0f;
20 }
21
22 void OscWavetable::set_freq(float _freq)
23 {
24 freq = _freq;
25 update_delta();
26 }
27
28 float OscWavetable::process()
29 {
30 // Perform interpolated table lookup at current read index
31 // to find output sample
32 const float y = lookup(idx);
33
34 // Increment current read index
35 idx += delta;
36
37 // Keep index from wrapping erroneously due to overflow
38 if (idx >= static_cast<float>(table_len - 1))
39 {
40 idx -= (float)table_len;
41 }
42
43 // Output
44 return y;
45 }
46
47 void OscWavetable::update_delta()
48 {
49 delta = (float)((float)table_len * freq / sample_rate);
50 }
51
52 float OscWavetable::lookup(float index)
53 {
54 // Split index into integer and fractional parts
55 const int idx_int = static_cast<int>(index);
56 const float idx_frac = index - (float)idx_int;
57
58 // Wrap indices
59 const int idx0 = idx_int % table_len;
60 const int idx1 = (idx_int + 1) % table_len;
61
62 // Read adjacent samples
63 const float x0 = wavetable[idx0];
64 const float x1 = wavetable[idx1];
65
66 // Interpolate to find output
67 const float y = bdsp::mappings::map_linear_norm(idx_frac, x0, x1);
68
69 return y;
70 }
71
72} // namespace bdsp::oscillator
